name: Brown Rice With Fennel And Asparagus
keywords: asparagus, brown rice, fennel, gluten-free, vegetarian, side dish, spring
recipeIngredient: 2 cups chicken or vegetable stock or water
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 1/2 cups thin asparagus cut in 1-inch pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a heavy two- to three-quart saucepan. Add fennel, onion and garlic and cook very slowly until vegetables are tender and translucent. Stir in rice and cook, stirring, another two to three minutes.

Add the stock or water, bring to a boil and cook uncovered for three minutes. Lower the heat, season the stock to taste with salt and pepper. Simmer covered about 40 minutes, until the liquid is absorbed.
Gently stir in the asparagus, cover the saucepan and set aside for 15 minutes before serving. Serve with a dusting of Parmesan cheese on top.
